plugin.name: world_mini
plugin.author: Fiendish, Lasher, Ruthgul
plugin.description:
.--------------. | world_mini | `--------------'
Places the world into a miniwindow, for layout purposes.
Features: - It retains the world window's original features. - It can be resized and moved around the main world window - It does not contain the other miniwindows (mapper, captures, events, etc.), so it can be placed in any position relative to them (top, bottom, left, right).
** REQUIRES **
- The file world_miniwindow.lua must be placed in the MUSHclient/lua directory. - MUSHclient must have write access to its folder.
Syntax:
* reset main - restores the default position and size
Plugin created by Ruthgul. Miniwindow code adapted from Fiendish's / Lasher's similar plugin for Aardwolf. This version maintained by Ruthgul,
Latest version: http://github.com/MateriaMagicaLLC/mm-mushclient-scripts
